title: Ban Appeal
body: Ahh.. Banned again... so i had been playing 2 game in a row which i have no intention of leaving the game. I got ddos for at least 2 hour and after that my second game i played half way and i got ddosed again. wasnt able to fix it.... and now i tried to play , i got banned fpr 20min per game 5 in a row... i request a unban as i have no intention of leaving the game or abandoning it.{{champion:103}}

replies.body: lol r u faker? ppl have no reazon to ddoz u  rofl

>I got ddos

I don't think you know what that means. If you're being attacked then you should call the police.

You aren't suggested to play League if you find that your internet connection is cutting out. After recognising this, you should play custom games until you've found a fix for it.

What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?

PS: As for your request to be 'unbanned' (which isn't even correct, because your account isn't banned; it's just penalised), it won't go through for it's against policy. A penalty will not be removed under any circumstances.
